Player History
Released by St. Louis on 3/2/2002...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 3/2/2002 to a minor league deal...
Released by Tampa Bay on 8/8/2007...
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2009...
Injured on 7/25/2009 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Pittsburgh on 6/9/2011 (Going to PIT: LF K. Seager, 1B S. Allie, RF G. Polanco, P D. Smyly, P G. Richards. Going to CHN: SS H. Ramirez, C E. Bellorin)...
Had first career hit on 5/31/2012, off Josh Beckett (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/2012, off Jason Frasor (NYM)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Montreal on 5/17/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/2014, hitting .370 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Milwaukee on 6/29/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/2014, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 10/6/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2015, hitting .533 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2016, hitting .400 with 6 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Tampa Bay on 5/9/2019 (Going to PIT: 3B K. Barnum. Going to TB: LF K. Seager, P A. Chapman)...
Injured on 5/29/2019 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 10/17/2020...
Won World Series with Tampa Bay in 2020...
